TopicTitle: Can't get rid of shroud on Terrier Engine

Articles.Content: All of a sudden all of my save games that use the Terrier engine all have the shroud attached now and I can't get rid of it. Even when I'm in the VAB and choose the Terrier engine (even by itself), it has the shroud attached and I can't get rid of it. Disabling the shroud has no effect. Anyone know of a mod I have installed that might be causing this?

Well to do that we would have to know what mods you have installed.

Get a list of mods, picture of your game data, and maybe an output log. Then we can help out.

I had a previous copy of the game from a couple of weeks ago. It didn't have this issue. I compared copies and saw the earlier copy didn't have the Missing History mod in it.  I deleted it and started the game again and the shroud was gone from the Terrier engine. The other issue I had was some of my saved crafts were displaying with big gaps between the stages. This issue also was fixed by taking out the mod. I posted on their forum section of my experience.
